本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: This course will focus on four main areas: First Nations languages and cultures, French Canadian culture, Anglo culture, and the influence of immigration on these three founding cultures inside one nation-state.
授業方法: This course will be held face-to-face.

第7回:
French Canada.
